modName: Dagi-Raht Khajiit replacer Requiem compatability patch requires Dawnguard
summary: Compatibility patch for Nuska\'s Dagi-Raht khajiit replacer so that it works with Xarrian\'s requiem mod.
descriptionHtml:
This patch restores the stat changes to Khajiit made by the Requiem mod when using the Dagi-Raht replacer mod.

In order for this to work your load order must be:
Requiem.esp
khajiit_replacer.esp
DagiRahtReplacerRequiemCompatible.esp

And you will need both Xarrian\'s Requiem mod found here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19281

And Nuska\'s Dagi-Raht khajiit replacer found here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20627

Both mods are excellent and highly recommended.

Also note that Nuska is not actively supporting the Dagi-Raht mod at present and as such the mod may be outdated and has not been patched for the most recent Skyrim updates.

If you want to use the Dagi-Raht custom race in Requiem you should use my other patch here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29883
author: Django03
